abstracts.cdata!:
This study points out that the
            Metropolitan Highway Plan provides the location for the
            Expressway Extension of Paseo de la República, for whose
            construction the city has reserved the necessary right of
            way. The characteristic of the entire roadway assembly is
            similar to the existing section of the Paseo de la
            República. An important part of the right of way is in the
            public domain, whereby traffic has been using partially
            paved streets and recreation areas, gardens and sports
            fields. Another part yet to be used is agricultural land and
            urbanized and built in areas whose owners are aware of the
            future construction of the roadway.The completion of the
            Expressway with its extension to Highway Pan and its
            junction with Av Pedro Miotto satisfies a large sector of
            the city of Lima, for both public transport and private
            transport. This is expected to generate large social benefits.
